title: Mobile App Offline Mode
description: Enable users to access core features without an internet connection.

title: Integrate with Third-Party Calendar
description: Allow users to sync events with their preferred calendar application.

title: Advanced Search Functionality
description: Implement filters and sorting options for search results.

title: Customizable Dashboard Widgets
description: Allow users to personalize their dashboard with relevant widgets.

title: Email Notification Preferences
description: Provide granular control over email notifications.

title: Accessibility Improvements
description: Enhance the application to meet WCAG guidelines.
